Name: Crab
Description: The crab attacks enemies that comes too close to either of it's sides.

Name: Surgeon Fish
Description: The surgeon fish hurls water at enemies within a two square radius in order to protect it's reef.

Name: Puffer Fish
Description: The puffer fish inflates itself, hurting nearby enemies with its scales.

Name: Snail
Description: The snail deals no damage, but its slime slows enemies by 50%.

Name: Anchovy
Description: The anchovy rushes towards its enemies, damaging all in it's path.

Name: Clown Fish
Description: The clown fish deals no damage, but uses it's comedic presence to boost nearby towers, increasing their attack speed by 50 %.

Name: Discus
Description: The discus searches its surroundings, smashing down on any enemies it can detect a 2 square radius away.
